overview: This is one of the more entertaining BG wrestling matches, featuring two wrestlers who know holds, who literally take on each other with no holds and no holes barred. Vince is the bigger of the two, but that does not deter Chris Rock from sometimes attacking in a daredevil manner. Both do not shy away from dirty maneuvers. Lots of ball grabbing, some sitting on faces even at one point, Rockland farting as Rock flees from the scene in disgust. Ugh! A multitude of great wrestling holds and submissions. Verbal interaction! Great sex. Once Rock is defeated, he takes his fucking like the man he is.
title: Fantasy Fight 16
